attributes.value: Finds the idea of fair-dealing foolish and cheats when she finds it profitable
Values artwork
Finds introspection to be a waste of time
Sees sacrifice as wasteful and foolish
Values peace over war
Is rarely jealous
Is often cheerful
Never becomes angry
Is confident under pressure
Finds a chaotic mess preferable to the boredom of harmonious living
Is unfriendly and disagreeable
Has great trouble mastering fear when confronted by danger
Is generally quite confident of her abilities when undertaking specific ventures
Is quite ambitious
Thinks she is fairly important in the grand scheme of things
Generally finds herself quite hopeful about the future
Is intellectually stubborn, rarely changing her mind during a debate regardless of the merits
Forms only fleeting and rare emotional bonds with others
Is sloppy with her living space
Is not readily moved by art or natural beauty
Quite susceptible to disease
A good intellect
Next to no natural musical ability
Poor empathy
